DOC.brief_summary: Among nulliparous woman singleton uncomplicated term pregnancy , elective induction labor 39 week , compare expectant management , reduces risk severe neonatal morbidity perinatal mortality .
DOC.brief_title: A Randomized Trial Induction Versus Expectant Management
DOC.criteria: 1 . Nulliparous previous pregnancy beyond 20 week 2 . Singleton gestation . Twin gestation reduce singleton , either spontaneously therapeutically , eligible unless reduction occur 14 week project gestational age . 3 . Gestational age randomization 38 week 0 day 38 week 6 day inclusive base clinical information evaluation early ultrasound . 1 . Project gestational age date first ultrasound > 20 week 6 day 2 . Plan induction labor prior 40 week 5 day 3 . Plan cesarean delivery contraindication labor 4 . Signs labor ( regular painful contraction cervical change ) 5 . Fetal demise know major fetal anomaly 6 . Heparin lowmolecular weight heparin current pregnancy 7 . Placenta previa , accreta , vas previa 8 . Active vaginal bleeding great bloody show 9 . Ruptured membrane 10 . Cerclage current pregnancy 11 . Known oligohydramnios , define amniotic fluid index ( AFI ) < 5 maximum vertical pocket ( MVP ) < 2 12 . Fetal growth restriction , define Estimated Fetal Weight ( EFW ) < 10th percentile 13 . Known HIV positivity modify delivery plan 14 . Major maternal medical illness associate increase risk adverse pregnancy outcome ( example , diabetes mellitus , lupus , hypertensive disorder , cardiac disease , renal insufficiency ) 15 . Refusal blood product 16 . Participation another interventional study influence management labor delivery perinatal morbidity mortality 17 . Delivery plan elsewhere nonNetwork site
